remarks: Fourier series convergence, for piecewise smooth functions.  See ~ fourierd for the analogous ` sum_ ` equation.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierclimd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
fourierclimd.t $e |- T = ( 2 x. _pi ) $.
fourierclimd.per $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fourierclimd.g $e |- G = ( ( RR _D F ) |` ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ) $.
fourierclimd.dmdv $e |- ( ph -> ( ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) \ dom G ) e. Fin ) $.
fourierclimd.dvcn $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( dom G -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierclimd.rlim $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ( -u _pi [,) _pi ) \ dom G ) ) -> ( ( G |` ( x (,) +oo ) ) limCC x ) =/= (/) ) $.
fourierclimd.llim $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) \ dom G ) ) -> ( ( G |` ( -oo (,) x ) ) limCC x ) =/= (/) ) $.
fourierclimd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierclimd.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( ( F |` ( -oo (,) X ) ) limCC X ) ) $.
fourierclimd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( ( F |` ( X (,) +oo ) ) limCC X ) ) $.
fourierclimd.a $e |- A = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( S. ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierclimd.b $e |- B = ( n e. NN |-> ( S. ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ( ( F ` x ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierclimd.s $e |- S = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( ( A ` n ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. X ) ) ) + ( ( B ` n ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. X ) ) ) ) ) $.
fourierclimd $p |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( + , S ) ~~> ( ( ( L + R ) / 2 ) - ( ( A ` 0 ) / 2 ) ) ) $.
$d F n x $.
$d G x $.
$d T x $.
$d X n x $.
$d ph x $.
